shibboleth.data

Interface DataStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachedStore, HashMapStore, SqlDataStore

    public interface DataStore
extends DataSource
    This class extends a DataSource in order to provide write functionality to a source.
    Author:
    Wilco Wisse

    • Method Detail

      • storeRepo

        void storeRepo(Repo repo)
        Store a repo, if repo has not been stored.
        Parameters:
        repo - The repo to be stored, should not be null.

      • storeUser

        void storeUser(User user)
        Store a user, if user has not been stored.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to be stored, should not be null.

      • storeContribution

        void storeContribution(Contribution c)
        Store a contribution.
        Parameters:
        c - The contribution to be stored, should not be null.

      • storeNewContributions

        void storeNewContributions(List<Contribution> cs)
        Store multiple contributions. Stores only those contributions which do not exist in this store.
        Parameters:
        cs - an array with contributions to be stored.

      • deleteRepo

        int deleteRepo(String fullRepoName)
        Remove all repos with the given repo name. Also the contribtutions of this repo are removed.
        Parameters:
        fullRepoName - The name of the repo
        Returns:
        The number of deleted items.

      • deleteUser

        int deleteUser(String userName)
        Remove all users with the given user name. Als the contributions by this user are removed.
        Parameters:
        userName - The name of the user
        Returns:
        The number of deleted items.

      • deleteContributionsByUser

        int deleteContributionsByUser(String user)
        Remove all contributions of a user
        Parameters:
        user - The name of the user.
        Returns:
        The number of deleted items.

      • deleteContributionsByRepo

        int deleteContributionsByRepo(String repo)
        Remove all contributions for a repo
        Parameters:
        repo - The name of the repo.
        Returns:
        The number of deleted items.

      • storedAllContributionsForRepo

        void storedAllContributionsForRepo(String repo,
                                 boolean flag)
        Method to indicate whether all contribution to the given repo have been saved in this data store. This enables DataSource.getContributions(String, boolean) to return a non null result if we call this function with ensureAll set to true.
        Parameters:
        repo - The repo
        flag - Indicates whether all contributions have been saved or not.

      • storedAllContributionsByUser

        void storedAllContributionsByUser(String user,
                                boolean flag)
        Method to indicate whether all contribution by the given user have been saved in this data store. This enables DataSource.getRepos(String, RepoFilter, boolean) to return a non null result if we call this function with ensureAll set to true.
        Parameters:
        user - The user
        flag - Indicates whether all related contributions have been saved
